channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Save as PDF Plugin by Pdfcrowd
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Save as PDF Plugin by Pdfcrowd

item.title: CVE-2023-5971|2024-05-09T06:00:02.319Z -- unknown -- save%20as%20pdf%20plugin%20by%20pdfcrowd
item.description: The Save as PDF Plugin by Pdfcrowd WordPress plugin before 3.2.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
